welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rugeley, a charming and historic city in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful countryside and rich mining heritage, we invite you to explore and experience all that Rugeley has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.
